q: to write his own songs for his debut album. According to The Mirror, Simon Cowell has approved the singer's request to pen his own tracks for the upcoming LP. A source said: Simon Cowell and Matt Cardle spoke over Christmas and texted ideas about what Matt Cardle wants to do. Simon Cowell has said that he wants him to write and co-write some songs.`` They know they want great material, if the songs are penned by Matt Cardle then even better. He's chuffed.
